description: Carry a reusable bag for groceries and shopping trips.
Remember to turn off lights when you leave a room.
Learn your local recycling guidelines and sort your waste accordingly.
Unplug chargers and electronics when they're not in use.
Share rides with friends or neighbors when running errands.
Grow your own herbs in small pots or containers.
Stay hydrated with a reusable water bottle instead of single-use plastic ones.
Start composting fruit and vegetable scraps for nutrient-rich soil.
Lower your thermostat by a degree or two in winter to save energy.
Whenever you see litter, take a moment to pick it up and dispose of it properly.
Explore thrift stores or online platforms for secondhand clothes and items.
